nodes.text: Sparis was a female Twi'lek who lived on Tatooine during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. Sparis sold a wide variety of items from a shop in the Anchorhead market.

Sparis was created for Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game released by BioWare on December 20, 2011. She appears in Anchorhead, the Republic-only city on Tatooine, as a Social Items Vendor.
